mapper.insert: insert into suggestion(meal, menu, date, memberId, categoryId) values(#{meal}, #{menu}, #{date}, 1, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: select s.*, c.name as "categoryName" from suggestion as s right join category as c on s.categoryId = c.id where c.id = s.categoryId ORDER BY date
select s.*, c.name as "categoryName" from suggestion as s right join category as c on s.categoryId = c.id where c.id = s.categoryId and date(date) between #{date} and #{date2} ORDER BY date
mapper.update: UPDATE suggestion SET meal =#{meal}, menu =#{menu}, categoryId=#{categoryId} WHERE date = #{date} and meal=#{meal}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM suggestion WHERE date =#{date} and meal=#{meal}
